body: My stats are broken on the leaderboard. It said I am Level 40 total, but it should be 49-50. Search if you don't believe me. Or am I not reading stats correctly?
body_tagged: My stats are broken on the leaderboard. It said I am Level 40 total, but it should be 49-50. Search if you don't believe me. Or am I not reading stats correctly?
title: Broken

replies.body: Stats are strange if your 50 in a game you just prestige.
replies.body_tagged: Stats are strange if your 50 in a game you just prestige.

replies.body: The "Total level" on the leaderboards adds up all of your xp, then puts it into a level. It doesn't add levels onto levels
replies.body_tagged: The "Total level" on the leaderboards adds up all of your xp, then puts it into a level. It doesn't add levels onto levels
